classData.comment:
/**
 * @summary A wrapper component for rendering Mermaid diagrams.
 *
 * This class abstracts the communication with the Main thread `Mermaid` addon, allowing developers
 * to use a declarative component to display Mermaid diagrams. It handles the lifecycle management,
 * ensuring the addon is loaded and the diagram is re-rendered when the `value` config changes.
 *
 * It uses the `Neo.main.addon.Mermaid` remote API to perform the actual rendering on the Main thread,
 * passing the diagram code and the target element ID.
 *
 * @class Neo.component.wrapper.Mermaid
 * @extends Neo.component.Base
 */
classData.summary:
A wrapper component for rendering Mermaid diagrams.

This class abstracts the communication with the Main thread `Mermaid` addon, allowing developers
to use a declarative component to display Mermaid diagrams. It handles the lifecycle management,
ensuring the addon is loaded and the diagram is re-rendered when the `value` config changes.

It uses the `Neo.main.addon.Mermaid` remote API to perform the actual rendering on the Main thread,
passing the diagram code and the target element ID.
classData.name: Mermaid

classData.comment:
/**
         * The mermaid diagram code.
         * Changing this value will automatically trigger a re-render of the diagram.
         * @member {String|null} value_=null
         * @reactive
         */
classData.description: The mermaid diagram code. Changing this value will automatically trigger a re-render of the diagram.
classData.name: value_

classData.comment:
/**
     * Stores the remote proxy instance of the Mermaid addon.
     * This proxy is retrieved during `initAsync` and is used to invoke methods on the Main thread.
     * @member {Object|null} addon=null
     * @protected
     */
classData.description: Stores the remote proxy instance of the Mermaid addon. This proxy is retrieved during initAsync and is used to invoke methods on the Main thread.
classData.name: addon

classData.comment:
/**
     * Triggered after the component is mounted.
     * Checks if there is a value to render and triggers the rendering process.
     * @param {Boolean} value
     * @param {Boolean} oldValue
     * @protected
     */
classData.description: Triggered after the component is mounted. Checks if there is a value to render and triggers the rendering process.
classData.name: afterSetMounted

classData.comment:
/**
     * Triggered when the mermaid code value changes.
     * Triggers a re-render to update the diagram.
     * @param {String|null} value
     * @param {String|null} oldValue
     * @protected
     */
classData.description: Triggered when the mermaid code value changes. Triggers a re-render to update the diagram.
classData.name: afterSetValue

classData.description: Initializes the component asynchronously. Retrieves the Mermaid addon proxy from the current worker for the specific window. This ensures the addon is loaded and ready for communication.
classData.name: initAsync

classData.description: Renders the Mermaid diagram. This method waits for the component to be fully initialized (ready) and then invokes the render method on the remote addon proxy.
classData.name: render
